ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or have they hatched a plot? It is We who are the Hatcher!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have they settled upon a plan? We shall also settle on one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have they contrived some scheme? If so, We too will contrive a scheme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If the disbelievers persist in their disbelief, We shall also persist in punishing them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do they assume that they have made their work thorough? So We shall make Our work thorough.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have they plotted some plan Then We too are planning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have they settled an affair? Then surely We are the settlers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or have they contrived some matter? We too are contriving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or do they determine any thing (against the Prophet)? Lo! We (also) are determining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have they determined upon a course? Then We too are determined.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have they determined an affair? then verily We are also determining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have they settled on some [devious] plan? Indeed, We too are settling [on Our plans].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What! have they settled some plan (among themselves)? But it is We Who settle things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have they plotted some plan? Then We too are planning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or have they devised a matter! We are devising.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have they contrived some scheme? We too are contriving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:79] Or have they, that is, the disbelievers of Mecca, contrived, consolidated, some matter?, in plotting against the Prophet Muhammad (s). For We [too] are indeed contriving, [We too] are consolidating Our plan to destroy them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or do they determine any thing) in relation to the Prophet Muhammad? (Lo! We (also) are determining) something in relation to their destruction.
